Here is the list of signs and their scores:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Aries tend to be impulsive, which can lead to a higher score.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Tauruses are known for being dependable and practical, but may not always be exciting.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Geminis are curious and adaptable, making them more open to new experiences.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Cancers tend to be emotional and moody, which can affect their willingness to try new things.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Leos are confident and outgoing, often seeking out new adventures.
6. Virgo - 4/10 - Virgos can be critical and analytical, making it harder for them to relax and have fun.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Libras value balance and harmony, but may also be open to new experiences.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Scorpios are passionate and intense, often seeking out thrill-seeking activities.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Sagittarians are adventurous and optimistic, always looking for the next big thing.
10. Capricorn - 3/10 - Capricorns tend to be cautious and responsible, which can make it difficult for them to take risks.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Aquarians are humanitarians and free-thinkers, often seeking out new experiences and challenges.
12. Pisces - 7/10 - Pisces are imaginative and empathetic, but may also be dreamy and unrealistic.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics, not individual personalities or experiences.
